    • getMarkByYear

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'STUDENT\') || hasRole(\'PARENT\')") public List<MarkResponse> getMarkByYear(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @PastOrPresent @PastOrPresent Year year)
      Description copied from interface: MarkService
      Retrieves a list of marks for a specific student in a given year.
      Specified by:
      getMarkByYear in interface MarkService
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      year - the year to filter marks
      Returns:
      a list of `MarkResponse` objects representing the marks of the student for the specified year Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `year` must not be null. The student associated with the `studentId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of marks for the specified student and year.

      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      year - the year to filter marks
      Returns:

    • getReport

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'STUDENT\') || hasRole(\'PARENT\') || hasRole(\'TEACHER\')") public SemesterReportResponse getReport(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @PositiveOrZero @PositiveOrZero Short year, @NotNull @NotNull Boolean semester)
      Description copied from interface: MarkService
      Retrieves a semester report for a specific student and year.
      Specified by:
      getReport in interface MarkService
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      year - the year of the report, must be positive or zero
      semester - the semester of the report (true for first semester, false for second semester)
      Returns:
      a `SemesterReportResponse` object representing the semester report Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `year` must not be null. The `year` must be positive or zero. The student must exist. Post-condition: Returns the semester report for the specified student, year, and semester.

      Specified by:

      studentId - the UUID of the student whose mark is being updated
      Returns:
      a `MarkResponse` object representing the updated mark Pre-condition: The `mark` and `studentId` must not be null. The student and mark must exist. Post-condition: The specified mark is updated and returned.

    • delete

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TEACHER\')") public boolean delete(@NotNull @NotNull Integer id)
      Description copied from interface: MarkService
      Deletes a mark by its ID.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface MarkService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the mark to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the mark is successfully deleted, false otherwise Pre-condition: The `id` must not be null. The mark must exist. Post-condition: The specified mark is deleted if it exists.
